body: Culture cells in 96-well plate by time point.
Equilibrate the plate to room temperature for 30 min.
Prepare control wells containing medium without cells for background.
Add a volume of luciferin solution equal to the volume of cell culture medium in a well \(luciferin solution \(vol.) : cell culture medium \(vol.) = 1 : 1).
Mix the contents of plate by gently shaking for 5 sec.
Immediately detect the luminescence with a luminescent plate reader. Suitable measurement time is 1~10 sec depending on equipment type.
